ch.epfl.lis.gnwgui
Class IONetwork

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lis.gnwgui.IONetwork

public class IONetwork
extends java.lang.Object

Implements all the methods to load/save networks from/to files.

Author:
Thomas Schaffter (firstname.name@gmail.com)

Instantiate the Open dialog used to load a structure or a dynamical model.

saveAs

public static void saveAs(GenericElement item)
Save the given network in a specified format and file. If the extension is not written by the (lazy) user, it's automatically added. If the specified file already exists, a dialog box informs the user and allow him to quit.

Parameters:
item - Network to save

openingFailedDialog

public static void openingFailedDialog(java.lang.String title,
                                       java.lang.String file,
                                       java.lang.String cause)
Display a popup if an error occurs during the loading of a network.

Parameters:
title - Title of the dialog box
file - Absolute path to the network file
cause - Description of the error

loadItem

public static void loadItem(java.lang.String name,
                            java.net.URL absPath,
                            java.lang.Integer format)
                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                            ch.epfl.lis.networks.ios.ParseException,
                            java.lang.Exception
This function loads a network using the given path and named the network following the given name. If any format is given, the function select the parser accordingly to the extension of the file. If the name of the network starts with a "#", the name of the network is the name of the network file.

Parameters:
name - Label of the element as printed on the iDesktop
absPath - Absolute path
format - File format
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
ch.epfl.lis.networks.ios.ParseException
java.lang.Exception

loadStructureItem

public static void loadStructureItem(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.net.URL absPath,
                                     java.lang.Integer format)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                     ch.epfl.lis.networks.ios.ParseException,
                                     java.lang.Exception
Load a network structure and add it to the Network Manager.

Parameters:
name - Label of the element as printed on the iDesktop
absPath - Absolute path
format - File format
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
